languages.text: {n}Скоморох невольно бросает взгляд в окно и неуверенно хихикает.{/n} "Решил{rt_mf||а} вспомнить о приличиях, звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} гость{rt_mf||я}? Что-то ты поздно спохвати..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Рыцари обнажают оружие. Для этих людей вы всего лишь простушка Лидзи, зачем-то побеспокоившая высших мира сего. Все, что вы сейчас можете им противопоставить — это слабые руки служанки.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out a hesitant giggle.{/n} "Decided to show a little decorum, my celestial guest? It is a little late for tha—"
languages.original_text: {n}Скоморох невольно бросает взгляд в окно и неуверенно хихикает.{/n} "Решил{rt_mf||а} вспомнить о приличиях, звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} гость{rt_mf||я}? Что-то ты поздно спохвати..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The jester casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out an uncertain giggle.{/n} "Decided to have a little decorum, star guest? It is a little late for tha..."
{n}The jester casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out an uncertain giggle.{/n} "Decided to have a little decorum, star guest? It is a little late for tha..."

{n}Ruoldo casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out a hesitant giggle.{/n} "Decided to show a little decorum, my celestial guest? It is a little late for tha—"
{n}Ruoldo casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out a hesitant giggle.{/n} "Decided to show a little decorum, my celestial guest? It is a little late for tha—"

languages.text: {n}罗尔多瞥了一眼窗外，发出了犹豫的咯咯声。{/n}“你是打算说些客套话吗，来自上界的客人？现在说这些，恐怕是有点晚——”
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out a hesitant giggle.{/n} "Decided to show a little decorum, my celestial guest? It is a little late for tha—"

traits.locale_text: {n}罗尔多瞥了一眼窗外，发出了犹豫的咯咯声。{/n}“你是打算说些客套话吗，来自上界的客人？现在说这些，恐怕是有点晚——”

languages.text: {n}ルオルドは窓の外にそっと視線を走らせ、不気味な含み笑いを漏らした。{/n}「ようやく礼節を弁える気になったかな？星の来賓どの。少しばかり遅かったようだがな―」
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out a hesitant giggle.{/n} "Decided to show a little decorum, my celestial guest? It is a little late for tha—"

traits.locale_text: {n}ルオルドは窓の外にそっと視線を走らせ、不気味な含み笑いを漏らした。{/n}「ようやく礼節を弁える気になったかな？星の来賓どの。少しばかり遅かったようだがな―」

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo lanza una mirada furtiva por la ventana y deja escapar una risita nerviosa.{/n} «¿Así que mi {rt_mf|invitado|invitada} celestial decide mostrar por fin un poco de decoro? Pues ya es un poco tarde para es...».
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out a hesitant giggle.{/n} "Decided to show a little decorum, my celestial guest? It is a little late for tha—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo lanza una mirada furtiva por la ventana y deja escapar una risita nerviosa.{/n} «¿Así que mi {mf|invitado|invitada} celestial decide mostrar por fin un poco de decoro? Pues ya es un poco tarde para es...».

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo, pencereden dışarıya gizlice bir bakış atıp tereddütlü bir kıkırdama koyuveriyor.{/n} "Semavi misafirim, adabımuaşeret göstermeye karar mı verdin? Bunun için biraz geç..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out a hesitant giggle.{/n} "Decided to show a little decorum, my celestial guest? It is a little late for tha—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo, pencereden dışarıya gizlice bir bakış atıp tereddütlü bir kıkırdama koyuveriyor.{/n} "Semavi misafirim, adabımuaşeret göstermeye karar mı verdin? Bunun için biraz geç..."

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo lance un regard furtif vers la baie vitrée et laisse échapper un gloussement hésitant.{/n} « Mon hôte céleste se décide à faire preuve de bienséance ? Il est un peu tard pour... »
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo casts a furtive glance out the window and lets out a hesitant giggle.{/n} "Decided to show a little decorum, my celestial guest? It is a little late for tha—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo lance un regard furtif vers la baie vitrée et laisse échapper un gloussement hésitant.{/n} « Mon hôte céleste se décide à faire preuve de bienséance ? Il est un peu tard pour... »

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo wirft verstohlen einen Blick aus dem Fenster und lacht unschlüssig.{/n} "Hat sich mein himmlischer Gast entschieden, ein wenig Anstand zu zeigen? Ist es dafür nicht etwas zu sp..."
